title: Fed to hold quarterly press conferences
author: VD
content_html: Apparently they can’t trust the financial media to lie adequately for them anymore. Of course, given the near-complete economic ignorance on the part of the media, it’s not as if Bernanke is going to be facing any difficult, or even pertinent, questions.
content_text: Apparently they can’t trust the financial media to lie adequately for them anymore.  Of course, given the near-complete economic ignorance on the part of the media, it’s not as if Bernanke is going to be facing any difficult, or even pertinent, questions.
